nodes.text: Around 1 ABY a large asteroid in the Kashyyyk system exploded, spewing large amounts of molten rock into space.

This exploding asteroid can be seen in the Kashyyyk system in Rage of the Wookiees, the second expansion to Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is a two-dimensional animated background image. The game provides no further information about the object or the events leading to its explosion. In the game files the animation is called "exploding asteroid".
